tweet: .@senatemajldr Mitch McConnell must heed the warnings of the Special Counsel and our nation‚Äôs intelligence community by taking up and passing these critical reforms. Failing to protect America against these serious and ongoing threats would be a grave mistake.

In March, we passed #HR1, the #ForThePeople Act, which included a comprehensive suite of election security reforms to protect the ballot box from cyber threats, stymie foreign disinformation campaigns and close loopholes that allow foreign governments to intrude in our democracy.

These attacks on our democratic process not only require our attention ‚Äì they also require action. Congress must move quickly to secure our democracy and protect the integrity of the vote ahead of the 2020 election. And @HouseDemocrats stand ready to act.
Special Counsel Mueller clearly and directly stated that, "There were multiple, systemic efforts to interfere in our election and that allegation deserves the attention of every American."

If @senatemajldr, @SenateGOP, @HouseGOP and talking heads like @jasoninthehouse have better ideas for securing our elections, let‚Äôs hear them. Democrats are ready to work together to protect our democracy. We have a plan. What‚Äôs yours?

#HR1 also stops foreign interference in our democratic process by closing loopholes in the foreign money ban and by increasing disclosure of secret spending in elections. #HR1 is an election security bill.

#HR1 responds directly to the Russian interference we saw in the 2016 election ‚Äì and that we will see again in 2020 ‚Äì by requiring social media companies to prevent foreign actors from purchasing ads on their platforms. #HR1 is an election security bill.

#HR1 provides states and local governments with more federal support to ensure that our decentralized, state-based voting systems have the resources they need to ensure security. #HR1 is an election security bill.
#HR1 requires @DHSgov and @ODNIgov to conduct election security reviews and to share threat data with states and local governments who run our elections. #HR1 is an election security bill.

Title III of #HR1 provides critical resources to states and local governments to help improve their voting systems ‚Äì including by purchasing paper ballot voting machines and implementing post-election audits. #HR1 is an election security bill.

To tell his fanciful hot take, @jasoninthehouse has to completely ignore the entire Title III election security section in #HR1.
